welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Maaseik, a charming city known for its historical buildings, beautiful landscapes, and rich culture. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for select domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
